Great family-oriented movie! A true classic for all ages to enjoy! I actually watched it for the first time on cable t.v. without ever knowing about it. I liked it so much that I searched for it and purchased it. I highly recommend this movie!

Gave 5 Stars for show, not the DVD! This show is included in the season 2 Of the life and times of Grizzly Adams Tv Series! DVD set! Both are from the Company Shout Factory! they both look like crap! bad picture quality! all because Shout Factory was to tight to put season 2 on 8 DVDS which it should have been!  And what really made me mad is they just copied this movie from the crappy made season 2 Grizzly Adams dvds they made, instead of taking it from the original  film footage to make it look good! If You have to have this show, then just buy season 2, because this movie by it self is not worth the price!
just what I expected. It is soooo nice to watch shows that talk of getting along with our wilderness instead of devastating it

Be careful!  The package and description implies this is the original movie "The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams" as well as a Christmas TV episode "Once Upon a Starry Night."  It is only "Once Upon a Starry Night."  I have to purchase yet another disc to get the movie because it isn;t included with season one or two either.  Thanks, CBS.
happy to finally own this...love grizzly adams
This is a great movie, my children watched Grizzly Adams when they were younger and my grandchildren just loved this movie. Thank You.
Loved watching this movie it made me feel good to watch a movie that had no sex or curse words in it.
Great if you don't already have the tv series as this is just an episode .

This movie is a wonderful treat for all! Dan Haggerty is the perfect actor for this role. Unfortunately you don't get the theme of this type movie any longer. We have become a generation that is hooked on more violence than story line. This movie has excellent acting, excellent story & you won't be disappointed! Again, you will have a hard time finding this movie anywhere other than AMAZON, and they have it at a great price!
a great family and Christmas movie
